EmailTemplate.name: Office Assignment change notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Online Claim office assignment notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {!User}, Your Case {!case number} has been reassigned to the following office. {!DIR_Case__c.Office__c } {!DIR_Case__c.DIR_WCA_Office_Address__c} {!DIR_Case__c.DIR_Office_Phone_Number__c} Labor Commissioner's Office
